channel.description: Recent content on Liam's BLOG-博客

item.title: Algorithm Review Memorization
item.description: Algorithm Review Memorization Heap Build Heap —- O(n) Disjoint Set linked-list representation make —- O(1) find —- O(1) union amortized time —- O(n) or O(m + nlgn) with the weighted union heuristic, where m is for the makes and finds rooted-tree representation union = two finds and one link make —- O(1) link —- O(1) find rank heuristic —- O(lgn) path compression —- shit both —- $O(m\alpha(n))$ Hash Collision solution: 1.
